build.command: sudo apt upgrade;sudo apt update;sudo apt install memcached;sudo service memcached start;sudo apt install python3-venv;pip install venv;python3 -m venv venv;source venv/bin/activate;pip install -r requirements.txt;python3 manage.py collectstatic --noinput;python3 manage.py makemigrations;python3 manage.py migrate;
